title: Custom Spec Schema
description: JSON schema for custom API mapping for nodebuilder

ignored.description: A list of rules to be ignored

oneOf.description: For some bash commands it makes no sense running them in a Docker container like ssh, vim, shutdown, service, ps, free, top, kill, mount, ifconfig.
Last user should not be root.
Use WORKDIR to switch to a directory.
Do not use sudo as it leads to unpredictable behavior. Use a tool like gosu to enforce root.
Do not use apt-get upgrade or dist-upgrade.

trustedRegistries.description: A list of trusted registries. Ex: docker.io
